sense.name: function
sense.commentary: office, part, purpose, use - the actions and activities assigned to or required or expected of a person or group
sense.examples: The role of a teacher changes daily. The government must play it's role. What is your role on the team? The role of an auger is to bore holes.

sense.name: character
sense.commentary: theatrical role, part, persona - an actor's portrayal of someone in a play
sense.examples: She plays the role of Desdemona.
